thread.title: Lots of space, perfect location
thread.title_full: Lots of space, perfect location - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chase C
title: Lots of space, perfect location
text:
A block from the 1,2 or 3 subway line, surrounded by restaurants and across from a supermarket, can see the Hudson from the upper floors. Suite Room was huge and had a kitchen with full size fridge and functioning gas stove plus microwave. Elevator was fast, check in and check out fast, rooms quiet and tv easy to work, what else can a hotel do for you?
Room Tip: high floors can see the Hudson See more room tips
